info.+content: ベイブレードバースト

Valt Aoi is a hot-blooded kid who loves to attack and wields a Beyblade named Valkyrie. His close friend Shū Kurenai is an elite Blader who is a genius but still puts in a lot of effort, and wields the Beyblade named Spriggan.
"Our Time" by Steven Allerick Chen [English Version]
#1: "Burst Finish!" (バーストフィニッシュ！) by Tatsuyuki Kobayashi
ベイブレードバースト アニメ公式サイト
ベイブレード公式アカウント (Official Twitter)

It's Training Camp! The Viking Stadium!!

A Deadly Struggle! The Battle with Longinus!!
Let's Finish It! My Partner, Valkyrie!!
